overview:
Eric Thompson joined Montagu Newhall Associates in March 2007 as the Vice President of Finance and was promoted to Chief Financial Officer in February 2008. Eric manages all of Montagu Newhall’s finance and back office operations.

Previously, Eric worked as a Manager in the Assurance and Business Advisory Services Practice for PricewaterhouseCoopers, LLP, in Baltimore. Eric served both public and private institutions and was responsible for providing Sarbanes Oxley Implementation and Compliance, oversaw the Initial Public Offering of a local biotech firm and was responsible for supervising regular SEC filings for his public clients. Additionally, Eric provided audit and advisory services to many of the areaâ€™s premier venture capital firms. Eric served on the PricewaterhouseCooopersâ€™ audit of Montagu Newhall since 2002.

A Certified Public Accountant, Eric received both his Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting and his Masters of Business Administration in Finance from the Sellinger School of Business and Management at Loyola College in Maryland.
